content:
DataPointCustomProperties Class

Definition

Represents the custom properties that are common to data points, series and empty points.

In this Article

[System.ComponentModel.DefaultProperty("LabelStyle")]
[System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomPropertiesConverter, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35")]
public class DataPointCustomProperties : System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement, System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IChartMapArea
Inheritance
Object
ChartElement
System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement
DataPointCustomProperties

Inherited Members

Equals(Object,Object)
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
Dispose()
Dispose(Boolean)
Equals(Object)
GetHashCode()
Tag
ToString()
Name

Remarks

This class defines custom properties such as colors, the use of background images, hatching, and so forth.

The Series class, DataPoint class and the EmptyPointStyle property are all derived from this class.

Constructors

DataPointCustomProperties()

Initializes a new instance of the DataPointCustomProperties class.

public DataPointCustomProperties ();

DataPointCustomProperties(Series,Boolean)

Initializes a new instance of the DataPointCustomProperties class.

public DataPointCustomProperties (System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series series, bool pointProperties);
series
Series

The series that the data point belongs to.

pointProperties
Boolean

A flag that indicates whether this is a data point custom property.

Properties

AxisLabel

Gets or sets the text of the X-axis label for the data point, series or an empty point. This property is only used if a custom label has not been specified for the relevant Axis object.

public virtual string AxisLabel { get; set; }
Value
String

The text of the X-axis label.

Remarks

This property can only be set at run time for a Series object. If you set this property or a Series object, all of its data points will use this label.

If the AxisLabel property is not set and a custom label has not been specified, an axis label will be generated automatically using the axis scale.

Empty point labels are set using the EmptyPointStyle property.

BackGradientStyle

Gets or sets the background gradient style.

public System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle BackGradientStyle { get; set; }
Value
GradientStyle

A GradientStyle enumeration value that specifies the background gradient style.

BackHatchStyle

Gets or sets the background hatching style.

public System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle BackHatchStyle { get; set; }
Value
ChartHatchStyle

A ChartHatchStyle enumeration value that specifies the background hatching style.

BackImage

Gets or sets the background image of the data point.

public string BackImage { get; set; }
Value
String

The background image of the data point.

BackImageAlignment

Gets or sets the alignment of the background image, which is used with the ChartImageWrapMode drawing mode.

public System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle BackImageAlignment { get; set; }
Value
ChartImageAlignmentStyle

The alignment of the background image.

BackImageTransparentColor

Gets or sets a color that will be replaced with a transparent color when the background image is drawn.

public System.Drawing.Color BackImageTransparentColor { get; set; }
Value
Color

A Color value that will be replaced with a transparent color when the image is drawn.

BackImageWrapMode

Gets or sets the drawing mode of the background image.

public System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode BackImageWrapMode { get; set; }
Value
ChartImageWrapMode

A ChartImageWrapMode enumeration value that defines the drawing mode of the background image.

BackSecondaryColor

Gets or sets the secondary background color.

public System.Drawing.Color BackSecondaryColor { get; set; }
Value
Color

The secondary background color.

BorderColor

Gets or sets the border color of the data point.

public System.Drawing.Color BorderColor { get; set; }
Value
Color

The border color of the data point.

BorderDashStyle

Gets or sets the border style of the data point.

public System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle BorderDashStyle { get; set; }
Value
ChartDashStyle

The border style of the data point.

BorderWidth

Gets or sets the border width of the data point.

public int BorderWidth { get; set; }
Value
Int32

The border width of the data point.

Color

Gets or sets the color of the data point.

public System.Drawing.Color Color { get; set; }
Value
Color

The color of the data point.

CustomProperties

Gets or sets the custom properties of the data point. Custom properties can be specified in the following format: AttrName1=Value1, AttrName2=Value2 â€¦

public string CustomProperties { get; set; }
Value
String

The custom properties of the data point.

CustomPropertiesExtended

Gets or sets the extended custom properties of the data point.

public System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomProperties CustomPropertiesExtended { get; set; }
Value
CustomProperties

The extended custom properties of the data point.

Font

Gets or sets the font of the data point.

public System.Drawing.Font Font { get; set; }
Value
Font

The font of the data point.

IsValueShownAsLabel

Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether to show the value of the data point on the label.

public bool IsValueShownAsLabel { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true to show the value of the data point on the label; otherwise, false.

IsVisibleInLegend

Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether the item is shown in the legend.

public bool IsVisibleInLegend { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the item is shown in the legend; otherwise, false.

Item(Int32)

Gets the DataPointCustomProperties object by its position in the collection.

public string this[int index] { get; }
index
Int32

The index of the custom property.

Value
String

The DataPointCustomProperties object at the specified index.

Item(String)

Gets or sets the DataPointCustomProperties object by name.

public string this[string name] { get; set; }
name
String

The name of the custom property.

Value
String

The DataPointCustomProperties object with the specified name.

Label

Gets or sets the text of the data point label.

public virtual string Label { get; set; }
Value
String

The text of the data point label.

LabelAngle

Gets or sets the angle of the data point label.

public int LabelAngle { get; set; }
Value
Int32

The angle of the data point label.

LabelBackColor

Gets or sets the background color of the data point label.

public System.Drawing.Color LabelBackColor { get; set; }
Value
Color

The background color of the data point label.

LabelBorderColor

Gets or sets the border color of the data point label.

public System.Drawing.Color LabelBorderColor { get; set; }
Value
Color

The border color of the data point label.

LabelBorderDashStyle

Gets or sets the border style of the label.

public System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle LabelBorderDashStyle { get; set; }
Value
ChartDashStyle

The border style of the label.

LabelBorderWidth

Gets or sets the width of the label border.

public int LabelBorderWidth { get; set; }
Value
Int32

The width of the label border.

LabelForeColor

Gets or sets the text color of the label.

public System.Drawing.Color LabelForeColor { get; set; }
Value
Color

The text color of the label.

LabelFormat

Gets or sets the format of the data point label.

public string LabelFormat { get; set; }
Value
String

The format of the data point label.

LabelMapAreaAttributes

Gets or sets the map area attributes of the data point label.

public string LabelMapAreaAttributes { get; set; }
Value
String

The map area attributes of the data point label.

LabelPostBackValue

Gets or sets the postback value which can be processed on a Click event.

public string LabelPostBackValue { get; set; }
Value
String

The postback value that is passed to a Click event.

LabelToolTip

Gets or sets the tooltip for the data point label.

public string LabelToolTip { get; set; }
Value
String

The tooltip for the data point label.

LabelUrl

Gets or sets the URL target of the data point label.

public string LabelUrl { get; set; }
Value
String

The URL target of the data point label.

LegendMapAreaAttributes

Gets or sets the attributes of the legend map area.

public string LegendMapAreaAttributes { get; set; }
Value
String

The attributes of the legend map area.

LegendPostBackValue

Gets or sets the postback value which can be processed on a Click event.

public string LegendPostBackValue { get; set; }
Value
String

The postback value passed to the Click event.

LegendText

Gets or sets the text of the item in the legend.

public string LegendText { get; set; }
Value
String

The text of the item in the legend.

LegendToolTip

Gets or sets the tooltip of the item in the legend.

public string LegendToolTip { get; set; }
Value
String

The tooltip of the item in the legend.

LegendUrl

Gets or sets the URL target of the item in the legend.

public string LegendUrl { get; set; }
Value
String

The URL target of the item in the legend.

MapAreaAttributes

Gets or sets the map area attributes of a data point.

public string MapAreaAttributes { get; set; }
Value
String

The map area attributes of a data point.

MarkerBorderColor

Gets or sets the border color of the marker.

public System.Drawing.Color MarkerBorderColor { get; set; }
Value
Color

The border color of the marker.

MarkerBorderWidth

Gets or sets the border width of the marker.

public int MarkerBorderWidth { get; set; }
Value
Int32

The border width of the marker.

MarkerColor

Gets or sets the marker color.

public System.Drawing.Color MarkerColor { get; set; }
Value
Color

The marker color.

MarkerImage

Gets or sets the marker image.

public string MarkerImage { get; set; }
Value
String

The marker image.

MarkerImageTransparentColor

Gets or sets the color that will be replaced with a transparent color when the marker image is drawn.

public System.Drawing.Color MarkerImageTransparentColor { get; set; }
Value
Color

The color that will be replaced with a transparent color when the marker image is drawn.

MarkerSize

Gets or sets the size of the marker.

public int MarkerSize { get; set; }
Value
Int32

The size of the marker.

MarkerStyle

Gets or sets the marker style.

public System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle MarkerStyle { get; set; }
Value
MarkerStyle

A MarkerStyle enumeration value.

PostBackValue

Gets or sets the postback value that can be processed on a Click event.

public string PostBackValue { get; set; }
Value
String

The postback value passed to a Click event.

ToolTip

Gets or sets the tooltip of the data point.

public string ToolTip { get; set; }
Value
String

The tooltip of the data point.

Url

Gets or sets the URL target of the area.

public string Url { get; set; }
Value
String

The URL target of the area.

Methods

DeleteCustomProperty(String)

Deletes the data point custom property with the specified name.

public virtual void DeleteCustomProperty (string name);
name
String

The name of the property to delete.

GetCustomProperty(String)

Returns the data point custom property with the specified name.

public virtual string GetCustomProperty (string name);
name
String

The name of the property to return.

Returns
String

The data point custom property with the specified name. If the requested property is not set, the default custom property of the data series will be returned.

IsCustomPropertySet(String)

Determines whether a custom property with the specified name was set.

public virtual bool IsCustomPropertySet (string name);
name
String

The name of the custom property to check.

Returns
Boolean

true if the custom property was set; otherwise, false.

ResetIsValueShownAsLabel()

Resets the stem.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.IsValueShownAsLabel* property to its default value.

public void ResetIsValueShownAsLabel ();

ResetIsVisibleInLegend()

Resets the stem.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.IsVisibleInLegend* property to its default value.

public void ResetIsVisibleInLegend ();

SetCustomProperty(String,String)

Sets a custom property of the data point.

public virtual void SetCustomProperty (string name, string propertyValue);
name
String

The name of the property.

propertyValue
String

The value of the property.

SetDefault(Boolean)

Sets the default properties of the data point. Indicates whether the previous property values must be cleared.

public virtual void SetDefault (bool clearAll);
clearAll
Boolean

A flag that indicates whether to clear previous property values.

Remarks

If the clearAll parameter is set to true, all previous property values are cleared, otherwise they are not.
